location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 31: William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Officials at Bussora [Basra] to [John Beaumont, Resident at Bushire]

mods.abstract: This letter has no stated recipient, but it would appear to be addressed to the Resident at Bushire, John Beaumont. William Digges Latouche and George Abraham report on an extract from a letter from His Majesty's Ambassador at the Port, dated 24 July 1779, which details the declaration of war between England and Spain.
